name: Overloaded (TheMadJester)
description:
How to play

Use WASD or arrow keys to steer the truck and be careful not to drop your cargo.

Total time spent: 3 hours

Credits external assets
  • BGM - Rainbow Rush by Yubatake opengameart.org
Known bug(s)

Parts of the buildings and truck are not visible due to a graphical bug in Godot. If you want the bug free edition see downloads section below.
